About this blog

### This content appears above the formatted about page content.

Steve Jurado

Twitter LinkedIn Github Facebook

I am a Bachelor of Science in Astronomy from the Universidad de Antioquia.

Recently I am a PhD. student in Astronomy at Departamento de Astronomía, Universidad de Chile.

I was born in Manizales (Colombia), one of the coffee world capitals. I moved to Medellin to study Astronomy. Aside from my professional work in astronomy, I also like hearing histories about the development of cities and civilizations during and after the independence centuries. In 2012 I entered Conservatorio de Música de la Universidad de Caldas, where I learned the basics to play guitar, reading scores, and a little choir. I want to practice choral music again. Also, I like the Rol/RPG games as table games as video games. If you are a new party, take me into account.

I worked on my bachelor thesis: Spectral characterization of two host stars by the TIGRE telescope, and I was working on my project for https://www.astroreca.org/internship-2021 Characterization of Progenitors and Explosions of Hydrogen-rich Supernovae

Education

University de Chile, Santiago de Chile, Chile | PhD(s) in Astronomy | March 2023

Universidad de Antioquia, Medellín, Colombia | B.S in Astronomy | May 2014 - June 2022

Experience

Wengo Analytics | Head Data Scientist | April 2018 - present

GeoScynce | Chief Analyst | Sept 2012 - April 2018
